subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: As expected, JaMarcus Russell, a quarterback from Louisiana State, was the first overall pick in the N.F.L. draft, going to Oakland. Not so expected was the fall of Notre Dame quarterback Brady Quinn.
snippet: As expected, JaMarcus Russell, a quarterback from Louisiana State, was the first overall pick in the N.F.L. draft, going to Oakland. Not so expected was the fall of Notre Dame quarterback Brady Quinn.
